name: Data Table Row
description: A standard table row with truncated primary text, secondary label, trailing Badge, and timestamp. The repeating unit inside data tables, activity feeds, and resource lists.
notes: hover:bg-background-900 for interactive rows. group class on the row enables child opacity transitions for action buttons that appear on hover.
code:
import { Badge } from 'ui-lab-components' const statusVariant = { active: 'success', pending: 'warning', failed: 'danger', inactive: 'default', } as const function DataTableRow({ primary, secondary, status, timestamp }) { return (

{primary}

{secondary}

{timestamp} {status}
) }
